column2: ENGLISH
Our armies now stand poised to take part in the [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for the [Root.Location.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName].
I finally stand before the destination of the crusade. With sword in hand I am ready to storm the walls of [Root.Location.GetName]!
Fighting the infidels has brought out the warrior in me!
How can God let the infidels defeat us...?
The target of our crusade, the [From.County.GetFullName], has finally fallen to our mighty arms and the wrath of God!

Good news! My brave knights have captured the target of the crusade, [From.Location.GetName]!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Pillaging through the ruins of a temple in Jerusalem I stumbled across the pieces of a very old lance...
Prying open a tomb in Caesarea that had been sealed for centuries, I found a very old wooden chalice...
Jerusalem is finally ours after a horrific siege. Entering the city we rode in the blood of the infidels up to the knees of our horses.
I have lost the siege of [From.GetName] and let the infidels take back the very target of our crusade.

I regret to inform you that we have lost the target of the crusade, [From.Location.GetName]...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
My call for a crusade against the infidels has apparently fallen on deaf ears, and a number of prominent Christian rulers have still not put on the cross.

To the Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded my call to arms against the infidels. I hope that this is a mere oversight on your behalf and expect that you will put on the cross in the near future.

[From.GetTitledName]
My reminder about their absence from the ongoing crusade has apparently fallen on deaf ears. I am very disappointed.
I am bitterly disappointed to see that you still choose to ignore my call for a crusade.
I am shocked to see that my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not yet answered the Pope's call for a crusade.

My liege,
I am concerned that you have not yet heeded the Pope's call to arms against the infidels. I pray that you plan to put on the cross in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
It seems my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has decided not to join the crusade despite his promise to do so. I am very disappointed.

My liege,
I am most disappointed to see that you have decided not to participate in the ongoing crusade.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
The Pope has finally called a crusade against the infidels and many of us are eager to fight. But my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has not put on the cross yet.

My liege,
Many of us are eager to join the crusade and fight for the glory of God. So it is with concern I notice that you have yet to answer the Pope's call to arms. I assume that you plan to put on the cross in the near future.

Your loyal subject, 
[From.GetTitledName]
It seems my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has decided not to join the crusade despite his promise to do so. I am very disappointed.

My liege,
I am most disappointed to see that you have decided not to participate in the ongoing crusade.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I should offer to lift excommunication for anyone who joins the crusade.
I am willing to lift the excommunication of you and accept your repentance, should you put on the cross and join the ongoing crusade.
Several excommunicated men have chosen to take up the sword against the infidels and joined the crusade.
I have accepted your decision to join the crusade as repentance and will hereby lift the excommunication.
Deus Vult!
Masha'Allah!
May the enemies of God tremble!
I feel my faith dwindling...
Victory is ours!
I must have found the Holy Lance!
Could it be... the Holy Grail!
Let us pray...
How will I live with the shame...
Curse the infidels!
Send a reminder immediately
Crusades does not concern me
Let it be know to them
Then so be it
Send [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] a reminder immediately
I will not be told what to do by a vassal!
Let it be know to [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
How dare [From.GetSheHe] question my decision?
Send [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] a reminder immediately
I will not be told what to do by a vassal!
Let it be know to [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]
How dare [From.GetSheHe] question my decision?
I will send out a proclamation.
I will accept this offer
Lift the excommunication
Odin, hear my call!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] be praised!
I will join the cause.
There is nothing I can do about it
I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
I trust [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] decision
I promise that I shall be on my way within a month
Never!
